00001 /*
00002 **
00003 **  $Id: cfe_tbl_filedef.h 1.6 2014/08/26 16:41:40GMT-05:00 sstrege Exp  $
00004 **

00010 **      This is governed by the NASA Open Source Agreement and may be used, 
00011 **      distributed and modified only pursuant to the terms of that agreement. 
00012 **
00013 **  Title:   ELF2CFETBL Utility Header File for Table Images
00014 **
00015 **  Purpose:
00016 **     This header file provides a data structure definition and macro definition
00017 **     required in source code that is intended to be compiled into a cFE compatible
00018 **     Table Image file.
00019 **
00020 **  Design Notes:
00021 **
00022 **     Typically, a user would include this file in a ".c" file that contains nothing
00023 **     but a desired instantiation of values for a table image along with the macro
00024 **     defined below.  After compilation, the resultant elf file can be processed using
00025 **     the 'elf2cfetbl' utility to generate a file that can be loaded onto a cFE flight
00026 **     system and successfully loaded into a table using the cFE Table Services.
00027 **
00028 **  References:
00029 **     Flight Software Branch C Coding Standard Version 1.0a
00030 **
00031 **  Notes:
00032 **
00033 **  $Log: cfe_tbl_filedef.h  $
00034 **  Revision 1.6 2014/08/26 16:41:40GMT-05:00 sstrege 
00035 **  Updated CFE_TBL_FILDEF_MAX_NAME_LEN to be set equal to CFE_TBL_MAX_FULL_NAME_LEN
00036 **  Revision 1.5 2014/06/03 10:35:05EDT lwalling 
00037 **  Updated CFE_TBL_FILEDEF macro to include reference to OS_USED macro
00038 **  Revision 1.4 2010/11/15 10:00:47EST dkobe 
00039 **  Modified definition of CFE_TBL_FileDef_t to ensure longword alignment

00051 /*
00052 ** Ensure that header is included only once...
00053 */
00054 #ifndef _cfe_tbl_filedef_
00055 #define _cfe_tbl_filedef_
00056 
00057 #include "cfe.h"
00058 
00059 /* CFE_TBL_MAX_FULL_NAME_LEN is defined in cfe_tbl.h and includes alignment bytes */
00060 #define CFE_TBL_FILDEF_MAX_NAME_LEN       (CFE_TBL_MAX_FULL_NAME_LEN)
00061 
00062 /* Compute number of additional bytes needed to make               */
00063 /* CFE_FS_HDR_DESC_MAX_LEN rounded up to nearest longword boundary */
00064 #define CFE_TBL_FILEDEF_FS_HDR_ALIGN32    (CFE_FS_HDR_DESC_MAX_LEN - ((CFE_FS_HDR_DESC_MAX_LEN/4)*4))
00065 
00066 /* Allocate enough space for maximum table description length plus alignment bytes */
00067 #define CFE_TBL_FILDEF_FS_HDR_LEN         (CFE_FS_HDR_DESC_MAX_LEN + CFE_TBL_FILEDEF_FS_HDR_ALIGN32)
00068 
00069 /* Compute number of additional bytes needed to make        */
00070 /* OS_MAX_FILE_NAME rounded up to nearest longword boundary */
00071 #define CFE_TBL_FILEDEF_OS_FILE_ALIGN32   (OS_MAX_FILE_NAME - ((OS_MAX_FILE_NAME/4)*4))
00072 
00073 /* Allocate enough space for maximum file name length plus alignment bytes */
00074 #define CFE_TBL_FILDEF_OS_FILE_LEN        (OS_MAX_FILE_NAME + CFE_TBL_FILEDEF_OS_FILE_ALIGN32)
00075 
00076 typedef struct
00077 {
00078     char        ObjectName[64];                           
00079     char        TableName[CFE_TBL_FILDEF_MAX_NAME_LEN];   
00080     char        Description[CFE_TBL_FILDEF_FS_HDR_LEN];   
00081     char        TgtFilename[CFE_TBL_FILDEF_OS_FILE_LEN];  
00082     uint32      ObjectSize;                               
00083 } CFE_TBL_FileDef_t;
00084 
00105 #define CFE_TBL_FILEDEF(ObjName, TblName, Desc, Filename) static OS_USED CFE_TBL_FileDef_t CFE_TBL_FileDef={#ObjName, #TblName, #Desc, #Filename, sizeof(ObjName)};
00106 
00107 /*************************************************************************/
00108 
00109 #endif /* _cfe_tbl_filedef_ */
00110
